dcterms:creator: Haroon Idrees
Amir R. Zamir
Yu-Gang Jiang
Alex Gorban
Ivan Laptev
Rahul Sukthankar
Mubarak Shah
dcterms:description: THUMOS'14 contains untrimmed videos from 20 categories. The length and number of action instances varies greatly. We follow previous works to use 200 videos from validation set for training and 213 videos from test set for evaluation.
dcterms:title: THUMOS'14

dcterms:creator: Fabian Caba Heilbron
Victor Escorcia
Bernard Ghanem
Juan Carlos Niebles
dcterms:description: ActivityNet v1.3 is a popular benchmark for TAL with 200 categories. On average, each video contains 1.6 action instances and about 36% frames are ambiguous action contexts or non-action backgrounds. We follow to use 10024 untrimmed videos from train set for training and 4926 validation videos for evaluation.
dcterms:title: ActivityNet v1.3
